attributes.action: advise his ministers that it is none of their damned business if we choose to drink to get drunk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We know that opening a second bottle of wine tonight is going to make getting up tomorrow slightly less comfortable, but we're making an informed choice. We've reduced our fat intake, we're eating less salt and - mmm, we promise to eat our oily fish. Seriously, enough is enough. While some of us might quite enjoy the idea of receiving orders from Caroline Flint, she really shouldn't be taking £10 million of our money to tell us off. Target under-age drinkers, weekend binge drinkers, aggressive drinkers and park-living cider drinkers by all means (though a greater police presence might be more effective than yet another advertsing campaign or 'public debate') but leave us law-abiding, tax-paying, Shiraz-drinkers in peace. Please.
